articles.author: Julia Davis
articles.title: Fantasyland: Russian General ‘Assassinated by the British’ - Center for European Policy Analysis
articles.description: The Kremlin and its mouthpieces are struggling to swallow a terrible truth — Ukraine’s agents regularly penetrate Russia’s security state.
articles.content:
Two things have become clear since the assassination of Lt Gen Igor Kirillov, head of Russias Radiation, Chemical, and Biological Protection Forces, in a bomb attack in Moscow on December 17.
